articles.title: 116 new COVID-19 cases in Dubuque County in 24 hours; 92 more in Jones County - telegraphherald.com
articles.description: Dubuque County reported 116 new cases of COVID-19 in confirmed between 11 a.m. Sunday and 11 a.m. today. The county’s total number of confirmed cases increased to 6,898.
articles.content:
Dubuque County reported 116 new cases of COVID-19 in confirmed between 11 a.m. Sunday and 11 a.m. today. The countys total number of confirmed cases increased to 6,898.

articles.title: Covid-19 infections are increasing in more than 40 states after an unprecedented weekend of more than 230,000 cases - CNN
articles.description: The virus is now spreading exponentially in all regions of the country. And the most recent 1 million infections happened faster than any previous million, in just 10 days.
articles.content:
